Class MyCanvas

drone.MyCanvas
public class MyCanvas extends Object

    • drawImageWithRotation

      public void drawImageWithRotation(javafx.scene.image.Image image, double ang, double minX, double minY, double w, double h)
      Draw an image with a rotation transform applied in given angles. Since cannot rotate Image directly, set rotation on canvas, draw the image, and reset the canvas.
      Parameters:
      image - to be drawn.
      rotation - angle.
      min - x of the image.
      min - y of the image.
      width - of the image.
      height - of the image.
